_header: Like as great waters increasen into floods fele
Subjects: acrostics; sins, deadly; clothing, against extremes of
_description: A song of ‘Galaunt’ (an acrostic of the Deadly Sins) — rhyme royal stanzas

CamTCC601.First Lines:
lYKe as grete wateres encresyn in to floddes feleSo that narow
                    forthese may hem nat susteyn…
CamTCC601.Last Lines:
…And trysyd to Tyborn and trodyn in the fereElles shall
                    England wayle that euer they came here

TokyoTak94.First Lines:
Like as grett water encresith in to flodes fele
                    So þat narow foorthis may hem not susteyne…
TokyoTak94.Last Lines:
…And tricede to tybabirton and treden in þe fer
                    Elles schall englond wayle þat euer cam thei her
                    Explicit Galaunt
